content: skill level easy materials cotton yarn/4 desired colors i use lion brand 24/7 cotton in the example photos u s size g/4 0mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors stitches & abbreviations chain = chain half_double_crochet = half-double_crochet half_double_crochet slip_stitch = half_double_crochet slip_stitch single_crochet= single_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch st s = stitches *please remember you are free to use this pattern to make/sell item s giving credit back to the designer do not republish or distribute this pattern or use my photos in any way feel free to share my shop links thank you
